title: Former Balochistan legislator calls on PM
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 20 (APP): Former member of Balochistan Assembly Mir Saleem Khoso called on caretaker Prime Minister Anwaar-ul-Haq Kakar here on Sunday and discussed matters of mutual interest.
Saleem Khoso felicitated him on assuming the office of prime minister and expressed his best wishes for him.
The prime minister thanked Saleem Khoso.
